channel.title: flutter on GOOD FOR HEALTH, BAD FOR PROGRAMMER
channel.description: Recent content in flutter on GOOD FOR HEALTH, BAD FOR PROGRAMMER

item.title: How to use AppBar Widget
item.description: Widget to implement the material design app bar. The app bar consists of a toolbar and possibly other widgets such as TabBar and FlexibleSpaceBar. AppBar class(API reference) Toolbar Implementation example of leading, title, and actions. Set Icon widget for leading Set Text widget for title Set IconButton widget for actions. SnackBar is displayed when you press the button main.dart TabBar Case of adding TabBar to AppBar.

item.title: How to use Column Widget
item.description: Widget that displays children vertically. To fill the available vertical space, wrap the child widget with Expanded widget. Column does not scroll. If you need a scrolling list, consider using ListView. Column class(API reference) Basic An example of displays three child widgets vertically. Set 3 custom color boxes for children main.dart Setting various parameters main.dart
